analysis.heading: Setbacks
analysis.content: Setbacks apportion a lot into two parts: buildable area (in the middle) and required yards (surrounding the building area). These required yards, meant to be maintained as open space areas, are important as landscaping opportunities to keep our neighborhoods attractive as well as for the preservation of privacy.
tables: Standard setbacks by zone table showing setback requirements for R-1, R-1(7000), R-1(8000), R-1(10000), R-1(20000), Flag lot, Substandard lot, and Substandard corner lot < 50' wide
Streets w/special setbacks list including Alma St, Arastradero Rd, Ash St, California Ave, Channing Ave, Charleston Rd, Churchill Ave, Colorado Ave, East Meadow Dr, El Camino Real and many others
